Description.val:
[P3A / (DN 110) Digital Modular Radio (DMR) Mobile User Objective System (MUOS)]: DMR MUOS - is a four-channel software defined radio that provides satellite communications, Line of Sight (LOS) and High Frequency (HF), Very High Frequency (VHF) and Ultra High Frequency (UHF) communication capability to surface, submarine, and shore facilities.  This variant includes the Integrated Waveform (IW) capability and allows for the use of the MUOS waveform.

[P3A - 2 / (DN 111) DMR MUOS Upgrade Kits]: DMR MUOS Upgrade Kits - this upgrade kit provides hardware and software to upgrade existing fielded DMR systems to include the Integrated Waveform (IW) capability and allow for the use of the MUOS waveform.

Justification.val: FY15 funding provides for the procurement of 44 MUOS upgrade kits and six (6) MUOS capable DMR systems. There is 24 months lead time for the DMR system which includes three (3) months integration, assembly and test time; FY15 procurements will start installs in FY17. There is 12 months lead time for the DMR MUOS Upgrade Kits; FY15 procurements will start installs in FY16.

Name.val: 4.1) DMR HF ALE DSA/Pre Shore Installation
